name: Neon Spirit
description:
This is a game made for  BlackThornProd gamejam #3

Theme: use LESS hoverboarding to gain MORE bonuses, score and to ultimatly finish the game.

HOW TO PLAY:

- hold left shift to use hoverboard

- click space to jump

(*the game is still unfinished, but will likely have updates such as fixing bugs and adding finishing features*)
